static ssize_t gaia::base::SharedBuffer::dealloc ( const SharedBuffer *  released) [static]

free the memory associated with the SharedBuffer. Fails if there are any users associated with this SharedBuffer. In other words, the buffer must have been release by all its users.

int32_t gaia::base::SharedBuffer::release ( uint32_t  flags = 0) const

release a reference on this buffer, with the option of not freeing the memory associated with it if it was the last reference returns the previous reference count
